name: Cardaria
summary: Сardaria is a simple and smart collectible card game with unusual mechanics. Create your deck and fight with real players. The game has 6 various heroes, more than 200 unique cards, and an infinite number of different strategies. The success of the game depends entirely on you. Get new cards to expand your own collection and create unusual decks and create smart decks to defeat your enemies. Perform daily and additional in-game quests to win valuable rewards. You can also challenge enemies in the arena to get a treasure chest.
